recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Bourbon Cream with Mint
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: the aged bourbon cream is a nice oaky thick cream backed up with flv cream. It adds a bit of bourbon but I wanted more so I backed it up with tfa kentucky bourbon. Flv Eggnog adds a bit of spice and tfa peppermint represents the candy cane stirrer.
